thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Refond Optoelectronics proposes FY 2017 dividend payment plan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Refond Optoelectronics proposes FY 2017 dividend payment plan

organizations.name: reuters) - shenzhen refond optoelectronics co ltd

text:
Feb 9(Reuters) - Shenzhen Refond Optoelectronics Co Ltd :
* Actual controller proposed to pay a cash dividend of 0.5 yuan(pre-tax) for every 10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 10 new shares for every 10 shares, as FY 2017 dividend payment plan
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/eyUFRx
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
